skillsDescription: Delivers mobile advisory services to farmers. Creates and disseminates digital advisory content.
whyInDemand: Rapid growth in digital agriculture tools (apps, e-extension, fintech, data services) is explicitly positioned as a youth jobs pathway.

skillsDescription: Uses GPS/GIS to optimize field variability. Analyzes satellite/drone imagery to create variable rate prescription maps.
whyInDemand: Precision services (including drone-assisted approaches) are highlighted as a frontier for youth-led service provision in agri-food systems.

skillsDescription: Operates UAVs for crop surveillance and mapping. Plans complex flight missions and processes raw imagery.
whyInDemand: High demand for aerial surveillance and precision mapping in large-scale plantations and for smallholder clustering.

skillsDescription: Interprets soil samples for nutrient management. Uses statistical software to analyze soil data trends.
whyInDemand: Critical for optimizing fertilizer use and soil health, directly impacting yield and sustainability.

skillsDescription: Operates mechanization equipment and spraying drones. Delivers services via platform models.
whyInDemand: Rising demand for spraying and mechanization services delivered via platform models (e.g., service booking).

skillsDescription: Installs and maintains water-saving irrigation systems. Manages on-farm water management technologies.
whyInDemand: Climate-smart practice adoption is pushing roles around water-saving irrigation and on-farm water management.

skillsDescription: Operates processing machinery for value addition. Manages packaging and small-scale manufacturing lines.
whyInDemand: Agro-processing is repeatedly emphasized as a job-creation engine (processing hubs, packaging, product development).

skillsDescription: Manages packhouse operations and cold-chain logistics. Reduces losses through proper storage and handling.
whyInDemand: High losses linked to poor storage/handling create strong demand for practical post-harvest and logistics skills.

skillsDescription: Manages pond/cage operations and feeding. Maintains water quality and production records.
whyInDemand: Countries like Kenya are explicitly scaling aquaculture to close large supply gaps and grow employment/income.

skillsDescription: Monitors fishing activities and enforces regulations. Conducts catch assessments and data collection.
whyInDemand: Fisheries agencies emphasize compliance/enforcement, responses to IUU fishing, and scaling technical capacity.

skillsDescription: Assembles and maintains photovoltaic systems. Wires DC components and connects inverters.
Ensures transmission stability and load balance. Runs grid simulation models to analyze impact.
Inspects buildings for efficiency improvements. Analyzes energy consumption data and calculates ROI.
Operates steam extraction and generation plant. Troubleshoots mechanical or electrical faults.
Troubleshoots and repairs turbine components. Performs composite repairs on blades.
Evaluates regulations and tariff frameworks. Models financial impact of different tariff structures.
Services Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI). Troubleshoots communication issues between meters.
Oversees renewable construction lifecycles. Manages budget and schedule for projects.
Enforces HSE standards and compliance. Conducts formal site safety audits.
Manages biomass conversion systems. Adjusts feedstock recipes to optimize gas production.
Extracts insights from complex datasets. Develops and tunes complex machine learning models.
Designs scalable cloud computing environments. Deploys secure cloud infrastructure.
Monitors networks for security breaches. Actively hunts for threats in the network.
Builds interactive user interfaces. Uses React or Vue to manage application state.
Develops server-side logic and APIs. Designs robust and scalable APIs.
Creates intuitive product user experiences. Conducts user research and creates prototypes.
Trains predictive models and algorithms. Implements deep learning models.
Guides product strategy. Manages product backlog and prioritizes features.
Automates CI/CD deployment pipelines. Manages infrastructure with code.
Drives growth via digital channels. Manages paid ad campaigns and SEO.
